title: Masjid is 30 minutes walk from home, can I skip Friday prayers? Does half hour ruling apply to Fri?
transcript: uh I had a question regarding the Friday prayer for me the Masjid is you know half hour walk and I remember in one of your other FAS if it's a half hour if it's that distance you know you don't need to it's not obligated to go there and with the Friday prayer I wondered if it takes the same ruling or if it's a bit different it is different the half an hour ruling is for the five daily prayers as for Friday prayer even if it's an hour drive you have to go there whenever you're in a in a city residing in it if the closest Masjid is an hour walk you have to go there because this is J this is Once in a week There's no um excuse for you for skipping it
